div.p: We thank Z.‐Q. Liu, C. Chen, H. Deng, J.‐Q. Huang, X.‐F. Wang, G.‐M. Xie, and Z.‐W. Guo for field assistance; S.‐Y. Tang, two anonymous reviewers and the Wiley Editing Service Team for linguistic assistance. This research was funded by the National Nature Science foundation of China (Grants 31160423), the Natural Science Foundation of Jiangxi, China (Grants 2009ZDN10500 and 2010GZN0119), the Science and Technology Project of the Education Department of Jiangxi Province (Grants GJJ13547 and GJJ12726), and the Natural Science Foundation of Jinggangshan University.
